name: midi-js-soundfonts
description: [MIDI.js](https://github.com/mudcube/MIDI.js) is a fantastic library for MIDI sequencing and playback in Javascript. It comes packaged with a [soundfont-generator](https://github.com/mudcube/MIDI.js/blob/master/soundfont-generator/ruby/soundfont_builder.rb) that is unfortuantely a little difficult to get up and running (requires installation of Ruby, Node.js, FluidSynth, Lame, etc.)
